verbs.description: [ARG0: The New York Court of Appeals , the state 's highest court ,] [V: rebuffed] [ARG1: Trump 's appeal] [ARGM-TMP: on the same day the New York attorney general filed a lawsuit against him , accusing the president of " persistently illegal conduct " at his charitable foundation] .

The New York Court of Appeals , the state 's highest court , rebuffed Trump 's appeal on [ARGM-TMP: the same day] [ARG0: the New York attorney general] [V: filed] [ARG1: a lawsuit] [ARG3: against him] , accusing the president of " persistently illegal conduct " at his charitable foundation .

The New York Court of Appeals , the state 's highest court , rebuffed Trump 's appeal on the same day [ARG0: the New York attorney general] filed a lawsuit against him , [V: accusing] [ARG1: the president] [ARG2: of " persistently illegal conduct " at his charitable foundation] .
